column1: #text=Planting a tree was one of the most difficult but memorable experiences of my life .
#text=When I decided I wanted to plant a tree I knew absolutely nothing about it , so my first step was to do some research .
#text=As it turns out , while it is possible to plant a tree from a seed , trees are most commonly planted in the for of saplings : small baby trees that come in pots .
#text=So I went to the Home Depot and picked a tree .
#text=I decided on an avocado tree because I love the buttery goodness of its fruit .
#text=I carefully packed the tree into my car and took it home , where I brought it into my backyard and dug a hole for it .
#text=After I dug the hole , I took the sapling out of the pot and placed it into the hole .
#text=Finally I filled up the excess space with leftover dirt and gave the tree a water in its new home .
